title: 1924 Estonian Football Championship
text:
The 1924 Estonian Football Championship was the fourth top-division <a href="Association%20football">football</a> league season in <a href="Estonia">Estonia</a>, organized by the <a href="Estonian%20Football%20Association">Estonian Football Association</a>. It was played as a knock-out tournament. <a href="SK%20Sport%20Tallinn">VS Sport Tallinn</a> won the championship for the third time in four years.
Final.
Champion was decided in a play-off series, played until first team reaches two wins.
